topics.World Events: Describe some of the major community, national and world events that changed your life and why.

topics.Philosophy: What are some of your life philosophies or life views that you would share with others?

topics.Inspiration: What inspires and drives you every day?

topics.Values: What are some of the personal values that are very important to you?  Share some examples of what you have done and what you are doing now to teach these values to your children and others.

topics.Influences: Who were the people who have had a memorable influence on your life.  What did they do that had such an influence on you?

topics.Curiosity: What makes you stop and go wow?

topics.Life Lessons: What are some of the most important life lessons you have learned and want to pass on?

topics.Travelling: Have you taken any special trips that have really changed your view on the world?

topics.Kindness: Who has been the kindest to you in your life?

topics.Pride: What are you most proud of?

topics.Children: What are your dreams for your children?

topics.Holidays: What is your favorite Jewish holiday and why?

topics.Mentorship: Who are/were your mentors and how did they help you grow?

topics.Jewish Food: Do you have any special memories of how Jewish Food impacted your life?

topics.Family: What family stories do you have to share?
